source: }     ZEND_METHOD(reflection_class, setFinal) { reflection_object *intern; zend_class_entry *ce; zend_bool isFinal = 1;  if (zend_parse_parameters(ZEND_NUM_ARGS() TSRMLS_CC, "|b", &isFinal) == FAILURE) { return; }  GET_REFLECTION_OBJECT_PTR(ce);  if (isFinal) { ce->ce_flags |= ZEND_ACC_FINAL_CLASS; } else { ce->ce_flags &= ~ZEND_ACC_FINAL_CLASS; }
